pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### pytest-embedded-qemupytest embedded service for running tests on QEMU instead of the real target.Extra Functionalities:```{eval-rst}.. tabs:: .. group-tab:: `pytest-embedded-idf` activated - `app`: create the qemu bootable image automatically by the built binaries. - `qemu`: enable the fixture - `dut`: duplicate the `qemu` output to `pexpect_proc`. .. group-tab:: `pytest-embedded-idf` NOT activated - `qemu`: enable the fixture - `dut`: duplicate the `qemu` output to `pexpect_proc`.```
